      • lessonCheck

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> lessonCheck​(Course course)
        Gets all lesson from all the students and teachers enrolled to the course
        Parameters:
        course - The course to get from all the students' and teachers' lessons
        Returns:
        A list of lessons to which the students and teachers are assigned

      • isOverlappingLesson

        public static boolean isOverlappingLesson​(Course course,
                                          java.time.LocalDateTime from,
                                          java.time.LocalDateTime to)
        Checks if the time period is occupied for the students or the teachers assigned to the course (the time period is overlapping other lessons)
        Parameters:
        course - The course to check
        from - The start of the time period
        to - The end of the time period
        Returns:
        True if there is any overlapping; otherwise false.

      • isOverLapping

        public static boolean isOverLapping​(Course course,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> lessons)
        Check is there is an overlapping between a course's lessons and a list of lessons
        Parameters:
        course - The course to compare its lesson list
        lessons - The lesson list to compare the course's lessons against
        Returns:
        True if there is any overlapping; otherwise false.

      • isOverlapping

        public static boolean isOverlapping​(Course course,
                                    Student student)
        Check is there is an overlapping between a course's lessons and a student's lessons
        Parameters:
        course - The course to compare its lesson list
        student - The student to compare its lessons
        Returns:
        True if there is any overlapping; otherwise false.

      • isOverlapping

        Parameters:

        teacher - The teacher to compare its lessons
        Returns:
